PMRD·251★ | Sword of Kaldra | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +5/+5. Whenever equipped creature deals damage to a creature, remove that creature from the game. Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card comes into play unattached and stays in play if the creature leaves play.)

Equip only as a sorcery. This card comes into play unattached and stays in play if the creature leaves play.)
